ProductInfo.Features:
FREE 19" Wide Screen LED Monitor Included In The Package.
6 Cameras, 1/3" SONY CCD Outdoor or Indoor, 650 TV lines, 3.6mm Lens, 24 IR LEDs, 65 ft IR Distance. 0.01 Lux/F1.2 Minimum Illumination. Metal vandal proof & water proof
8 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime, 2TB HDD, 960×480 & 30FPS recording, HDMI & VGA Outputs, HI 3521 CPU.
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support
ProductInfo.Name: GW High-End CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor, 8 Channel 2TB HDD 960H & D1 Real Time Recording, 6 SONY CCD Outdoor or Indoor Camera 650 TV lines, iPhone Android Viewable
